entities.name: whomping willow
entities.description: The Whomping Willow is a valuable tree in the park that has been damaged. It is described as 'mad' and its branches can cause physical harm.

entities.name: misuse of muggle artefacts office
entities.description: The Misuse of Muggle Artefacts Office is a place where Mr Weasley works. It is mentioned in the context of Harry's father working there.

entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: Harry Potter is the main character who feels sick and worried about being expelled from school.

entities.name: ron weasley
entities.description: Ron Weasley is Harry's friend who is also in trouble with Snape.

entities.name: severus snape
entities.description: Severus Snape is the teacher who is disciplining Ron and Harry for their actions.

entities.name: mr weasley
entities.description: Mr Weasley is Harry's father who works in the Misuse of Muggle Artefacts Office. He has bewitched a car, which could cause trouble if discovered.

relationships.description: Snape is disciplining Ron for his actions.
Harry is worried about the damage caused by the Whomping Willow.
Snape is also disciplining Harry for his actions.
Mr Weasley has bewitched a car, which could cause trouble if discovered.
